name: Playing In Traffic Simulator
description:
Playing In Traffic Simulator is an endless runner game where you continuously run forward while avoiding the obstacles in the street. This includes road blocks to jump over and semi trucks to avoid, and the map generates the obstacles randomly every single run! The further you run, the higher your score!

This game was made in Unreal Engine 5 for an app style game with a team of 3 in under 1 week.
